From: Doug Brenner [mailto:dougbrenner@comcast.net] Sent: Wednesday, December 07, 2011 11:39 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: MBO Partners
Hi Steve.
Thank you for the email.
I am still interested – I’d like to schedule a call with you once I’ve dug myself out of today’s mire.
Regards,
Doug.
From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 07, 2011 11:22 AM To: dougbrenner@comcast.net Subject: MBO Partners
Doug,
I wanted to follow up to our email conversation (Q&A) on MBO Partners. Any update as to your level of interest in speaking further about our services would be great.
Regards,
Steve
